translation: O mind ! the asceticism be practised in this way :

gurmukhi: bn sy sdn, sbY kir smJhu; mn hI mwih audwsw ]1] rhwau ]
transliteration: Ban Se Sadan Sabhai Kar(i) Samjhoh Man Himaah(i) Udaasaa||aa|| Rahaao||
translation: Consider your house as the forest and remain unattached within yourself…..Pause.

gurmukhi: jq kI jtw, jog ko m`jnu; nym ky nKn bFwE ]
transliteration: Jat Kijataa Jog Ko Majjan(u) Nem Ke Nakhanndbadhaao||
translation: Consider continence as the matted hair, Yoga as the ablution and daily observances as your nails,

gurmukhi: igAwn gurU, Awqm aupdyshu; nwm ibBUq lgwE ]1]
transliteration: Gadaan Guroo Aatam Oupdeshoh Naam Bibhoot Lagado||1||
translation: Consider the knowledge as the preceptor giving lessons to you and apply the Name of the Lord as ashes.1.

gurmukhi: Alp Ahwr, sulp sI inMdRw; dXw iCmw qn pRIiq ]
transliteration: Alap Ahhaar Sulap Sinindraa Dayaa Chhimaa Tan Preet(i)||
translation: Eat less and sleep less, cherish mercy and forgiveness;

gurmukhi: sIl sMqoK sdw inrbwihbo; hÍYbo iqRgux AqIiq ]2]
transliteration: Sil Santokh Sadaa Nribeehibo Hvaiho Tigoun Ateet(i)||2||
translation: Practise gentleness and contentment and remain free from three modes.2.

gurmukhi: kwm k®oD hMkwr loB hT; moh n mn isau lÎwvY ]
transliteration: Kaam Krodh Hankaar Lobh Hath Moh Na Man So Lyaavai||
translation: Keep your mind unattached from lust, anger, greed, insistence and infatuation,

gurmukhi: qb hI Awqm qq ko drsy; prm purK kh pwvY ]3]1]
transliteration: Tab Hiaatam Tat Ko Dares Param Purakh Kah Paavai||3||1||
translation: Then you will visualize the supreme essence and realise the supreme Purusha.3.1.

gurmukhi: ry mn; ieh ibiD jogu kmwE ]
transliteration: Re Man Eh(i) Bidh(i) Jog(u) Kamaao||
translation: O Mind ! the Yoga be practised in this way :

gurmukhi: isM|I swc Akpt kMTlw; iDAwn ibBUq cVHwE ]1] rhwau ]
transliteration: Singisaach Akapt Kanthlaa Dhiaan Bibhoot Chadgadi||1||rahaao||
translation: Consider the Truth as the horn, sincerity the necklace and meditation as ashes to be applied to your body…...Pause.

gurmukhi: qwqI ghu Awqm bis kr kI; iB`Cw nwm ADwrM ]
transliteration: Taatigadu Aatam Bas(i) Kar Kibhichchhaadnaam Adhaaran||
translation: Make self-control your lyre and the prop of the Name as your alms,

gurmukhi: bwjy prm qwr qqu hir ko; aupjY rwg rswrM ]1]
transliteration: Baaje Param Taar Tat(u) Har(i) Ko Oupjai Raag Rasaaran||1||
translation: Then the supreme essence will be played like the main string creating savoury divine music.1.
